1.0.0.en: First version of the app added to the store

1.1.0.en: Updated to support Homey v3.0.0 features

1.2.0.en: Fixed app crashes and stability issues introduced after Homey version 7.4.1 update

1.2.1.en: Fixed app crashes related to timeline notification settings

1.3.0.en: Added new service UUID support. Improved new device discovery. Improved update loop consistency.

1.3.1.en: Changed timeout for better discover consistency
